title: ‘If You Don’t Have Money, You Have Sisters’: Afghan Men Use Taliban Rule to Settle Scores
content:
1. ‘If You Don’t Have Money, You Have Sisters’: Afghan Men Use Taliban Rule to Settle Scores  The Wall Street Journal
